abstract.text: Construct and manage a graphical, event-driven user interface for your macOS app.
An interface to the Cocoa spell-checking service.
The constants are optional keys that can be used in the options dictionary parameter of the
Requests unified text checking for the given range of the given string.
Provides a menu containing contextual menu items suitable for certain kinds of detected results.
Requests that the string be checked in the background.
A Swift-only concrete structure that backs the range type alias.

Defines the types of checking that are available. These values can be combined using the C-bitwise OR operator. The system supports its own internal types, and the user can extend those types by subclassing `NSTextCheckingResult` and adding their own custom types.
